testCases.title: Verify visibility of all key UI elements on the Login page
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Verify SnapPod Logo is visible: await expect(page.getByAltText('SnapPod Logo')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Welcome Back!' heading is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('heading', { name: 'Welcome Back!' })).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Email *' label is visible: await expect(page.getByLabelText('Email *')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Password *' label is visible: await expect(page.getByLabelText('Password *')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Forgot Password' link is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('link', { name: 'Forgot Password' })).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Login' button is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Login' })).toBeVisible()
Verify 'or' text is visible: await expect(page.getByText('or')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Sign in with Google' button is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Sign in with Google' })).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Don't have an account?' text is visible: await expect(page.getByText('Don\'t have an account?')).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Sign Up Here' link is visible: await expect(page.getByRole('link', { name: 'Sign Up Here' })).toBeVisible()
expected: All specified UI elements are visible and correctly displayed on the login page.

testCases.title: Verify user can successfully log in with valid credentials
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page. User has valid credentials.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Enter valid email address: await page.locator(inputs.emailLocator).fill(inputs.email)
Enter valid password: await page.locator(inputs.passwordLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click the 'Login' button: await page.locator(inputs.loginButtonLocator).click()
Verify successful navigation to a protected dashboard page or success message: await expect(page).toHaveURL(https://dev.vox.snappod.ai/welcome-to-snappod-ai)
expected: User is redirected to the dashboard or a success message is displayed.
No error messages are shown.

testCases.title: Verify login fails with invalid credentials and shows error
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page.

inputs.expectedErrorMessage: Email does not exists,Please sign up first

steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Enter invalid email address: await page.locator(inputs.emailLocator).fill(inputs.email)
Enter incorrect password: await page.locator(inputs.passwordLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click the 'Login' button: await page.locator(inputs.loginButtonLocator).click()
Verify an error message is displayed: await expect(page.getByText(inputs.expectedErrorMessage)).toBeVisible()
Verify the user remains on the login page: await expect(page).toHaveURL(inputs.url)
expected: An appropriate error message for invalid credentials is displayed.
User remains on the login page.

testCases.title: Verify login fails when email field is empty
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Ensure email field is empty: await page.locator(inputs.emailLocator).fill(inputs.email)
Enter a password: await page.locator(inputs.passwordLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click the 'Login' button: await page.locator(inputs.loginButtonLocator).click()
Verify the email input field shows a validation message: await expect(page.locator(inputs.emailLocator)).toHaveJSProperty('validationMessage', 'Please fill out this field.')
Verify user remains on the login page: await expect(page).toHaveURL(inputs.url)
expected: A browser-level or UI validation message prompts the user to fill out the email field.
User remains on the login page.

testCases.title: Verify login fails when password field is empty
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Enter an email address: await page.locator(inputs.emailLocator).fill(inputs.email)
Ensure password field is empty: await page.locator(inputs.passwordLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click the 'Login' button: await page.locator(inputs.loginButtonLocator).click()
Verify the password input field shows a validation message: await expect(page.locator(inputs.passwordLocator)).toHaveJSProperty('validationMessage', 'Please fill out this field.')
Verify user remains on the login page: await expect(page).toHaveURL(inputs.url)
expected: A browser-level or UI validation message prompts the user to fill out the password field.
User remains on the login page.

testCases.title: Verify login fails with invalid email format
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Enter an invalid email format: await page.locator(inputs.emailLocator).fill(inputs.email)
Enter a password: await page.locator(inputs.passwordLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Click the 'Login' button: await page.locator(inputs.loginButtonLocator).click()
Verify the email input field shows a validation message: await expect(page.locator(inputs.emailLocator)).toHaveJSProperty('validationMessage', expect.stringContaining('@'))
Verify user remains on the login page: await expect(page).toHaveURL(inputs.url)
expected: A browser-level or UI validation message prompts the user for a valid email format.
User remains on the login page.

testCases.title: Verify 'Show password' toggle changes password input type
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Enter a password into the password field: await page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator).fill(inputs.password)
Verify the input type is 'password': await expect(page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator)).toHaveAttribute('type', 'password')
Click the 'Show password' toggle: await page.locator(inputs.showPasswordToggleLocator).click()
Verify the input type is now 'text': await expect(page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator)).toHaveAttribute('type', 'text')
Click the 'Show password' toggle again: await page.locator(inputs.showPasswordToggleLocator).click()
Verify the input type is back to 'password': await expect(page.locator(inputs.passwordInputLocator)).toHaveAttribute('type', 'password')
expected: The password input field toggles between 'password' and 'text' type on each click of the 'Show password' toggle.

testCases.title: Verify 'Sign Up Here' link navigates to the Sign Up page
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click the 'Sign Up Here' link: await page.locator(inputs.signUpLinkLocator).click()
Verify navigation to the Sign Up page: await expect(page).toHaveURL(inputs.expectedSignUpUrl)
expected: User is successfully redirected to the Sign Up page.

testCases.title: Verify 'Forgot Password' link opens the password reset modal
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click the 'Forgot Password' link: await page.locator(inputs.forgotPasswordLinkLocator).click()
Verify the 'Reset Password' heading in the modal is visible: await expect(page.locator(inputs.resetPasswordHeadingLocator)).toBeVisible()
expected: The password reset modal is displayed with the 'Reset Password' heading.

testCases.title: Verify 'Sign in with Google' button initiates Google authentication flow
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open and navigated to the login page.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click the 'Sign in with Google' button: await page.locator(inputs.googleSignInButtonLocator).click()
Verify that a new page or modal related to Google authentication is opened (e.g., URL contains 'accounts.google.com'): await page.waitForURL(/accounts.google.com/)
expected: The browser navigates to or opens a modal for the Google authentication process.

testCases.title: Verify visibility of all key UI elements in the Forgot Password modal
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open, navigated to login page, and Forgot Password modal is open.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click the 'Forgot Password' link to open the modal: await page.locator(inputs.forgotPasswordLinkLocator).click()
Verify close button is visible: await expect(page.locator(inputs.closeButtonLocator)).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Reset Password' heading is visible: await expect(page.locator(inputs.resetPasswordHeadingLocator)).toBeVisible()
Verify instruction text is visible: await expect(page.locator(inputs.instructionTextLocator)).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Email Address' label is visible: await expect(page.locator(inputs.emailAddressLabelLocator)).toBeVisible()
Verify email input field is visible: await expect(page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator)).toBeVisible()
Verify 'Send Reset Code' button is visible: await expect(page.locator(inputs.sendResetCodeButtonLocator)).toBeVisible()
expected: All specified UI elements within the Forgot Password modal are visible.

testCases.title: Verify 'Close' button closes the Forgot Password modal
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open, navigated to login page, and Forgot Password modal is open.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click the 'Forgot Password' link to open the modal: await page.locator(inputs.forgotPasswordLinkLocator).click()
Verify modal heading is visible initially: await expect(page.locator(inputs.resetPasswordHeadingLocator)).toBeVisible()
Click the close button: await page.locator(inputs.closeButtonLocator).click()
Verify the modal heading is no longer visible: await expect(page.locator(inputs.resetPasswordHeadingLocator)).not.toBeVisible()
expected: The Forgot Password modal is successfully closed and its elements are no longer visible.

testCases.title: Verify sending reset code with a valid email address
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open, navigated to login page, and Forgot Password modal is open.

inputs.expectedSuccessMessage: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox.

steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click 'Forgot Password' link: await page.locator(inputs.forgotPasswordLinkLocator).click()
Enter a valid email address: await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.validEmail)
Click 'Send Reset Code' button: await page.locator(inputs.sendResetCodeButtonLocator).click()
Verify a success message is displayed: await expect(page.getByText(inputs.expectedSuccessMessage)).toBeVisible()
Verify the modal closes or indicates success state: await expect(page.getByRole('heading', { name: 'Reset Password' })).not.toBeVisible()
expected: A success message confirming the email sent is displayed.
The modal closes or updates to a success state.

testCases.title: Verify error message for invalid email format when sending reset code
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open, navigated to login page, and Forgot Password modal is open.

inputs.expectedValidationMessage: Please include an '@' in the email address.

steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click 'Forgot Password' link: await page.locator(inputs.forgotPasswordLinkLocator).click()
Enter an invalid email format: await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.invalidEmail)
Click 'Send Reset Code' button: await page.locator(inputs.sendResetCodeButtonLocator).click()
Verify the email input field shows a validation message: await expect(page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator)).toHaveJSProperty('validationMessage', expect.stringContaining('@'))
Verify the modal remains open: await expect(page.getByRole('heading', { name: 'Reset Password' })).toBeVisible()
expected: A browser-level or UI validation message prompts the user for a valid email format.
The modal remains open.

testCases.title: Verify error message for empty email when sending reset code
testCases.preconditions: Browser is open, navigated to login page, and Forgot Password modal is open.
steps: Navigate to the login page: await page.goto(inputs.url)
Click 'Forgot Password' link: await page.locator(inputs.forgotPasswordLinkLocator).click()
Ensure email field is empty: await page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator).fill(inputs.emptyEmail)
Click 'Send Reset Code' button: await page.locator(inputs.sendResetCodeButtonLocator).click()
Verify the email input field shows a validation message: await expect(page.locator(inputs.emailInputLocator)).toHaveJSProperty('validationMessage', inputs.expectedValidationMessage)
Verify the modal remains open: await expect(page.getByRole('heading', { name: 'Reset Password' })).toBeVisible()
expected: A browser-level or UI validation message prompts the user to fill out the email field.
The modal remains open.
